title: Get a Donald Russell Easter Roast Dinner box for £40
content:
Make this Easter extra special for your family with a beautiful roast dinner, courtesy of Donald Russell. With this exclusive deal, Donald Russell will deliver a selection of premium-quality Easter food, including a rump roast, caramelised carrots and handmade apples pies, directly to your front door for only £40 (RRP £54.10), plus free delivery!

Get your Easter box now

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

As a proud holder of a Royal Warrant, Donald Russell supplies some of the world’s finest Michelin-starred restaurants and luxury hotels, with a commitment to quality and passion for great-tasting food that has earned over 300,000 five-star reviews.

A delicious feast for the whole family to enjoy, the Easter Roast Dinner Box for 4 includes:

– 1 large grass-fed British rump roast (950g)

– 2 packs of creamy Dauphinoise potatoes

– 2 packs of sweet caramelised carrots

– 2 packs of honey roast parsnips

– 4 handmade Bramley apple pies and smooth vanilla custard.

Order now with FREE delivery and select a delivery date that works for you.

Enlarge photo

Offer ends 09/04/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

Get your Easter box now

You can find all our current shopping deals here. If you have any questions about the deal product or the related services, please contact the provider directly. If you have any questions about the online shopping deal itself, or if you would like to work with us as a partner, please email deals@bikeradar.com
author: Steve Newell
